bill_title: require voter registration information to be made available to the public by certain licensing agents.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require voter registration information to be made available to the public by certain licensing agents. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 41-6 be amended by adding a NEW SECTION to read: At each location where hunting, fishing, or trapping licenses or permits are sold, voter registration applications shall be displayed and made available to the public. A license agent shall ask each person who applies for a hunting, fishing, or trapping license or permit if the person would like a voter registration application and may provide the voter registration application to the license or permit applicant but may not assist the person with the voter registration application or collect complete or incomplete voter registration applications. Each person who applies for a hunting, fishing, or trapping license or permit on the internet shall be provided a link to the secretary of state's online statewide voter registration application. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.167 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: Withdrawn at the Request of the Prime Sponsor
